summary: For 48 hours, Amazon Prime members can claim a trio of free games, including 'Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League.'

title: Snag $125 off the Dyson Airwrap bundle ahead of Prime Day
content: As of July 15, you can get the Dyson Airwrap bundle for $549.99, down from $674.99 at Amazon. That's a 19% discount of $125.
summary: As of July 15, you can get the Dyson Airwrap bundle for $549.99, down from $674.99 at Amazon. That's a 19% discount of $125.

title: This service will beat your dating fatigue in 2024

title: TikTok's viral Ninja Creami ice cream maker is $50 off for Prime Day
content: As of July 15, you can get the Ninja Creami ice cream maker for $149.99, down from $199.99, at Amazon. That's a $50 discount.
summary: As of July 15, you can get the Ninja Creami ice cream maker for $149.99, down from $199.99, at Amazon. That's a $50 discount.

title: Seven invite-only deals are live ahead of Prime Day 2024
content: Amazon Prime Day is almost here, returning on July 16 and 17, and for the second year in a row, they're bringing back invite-only deals. Here's what's available so far, plus everything else you need to know.
summary: Amazon Prime Day is almost here, returning on July 16 and 17, and for the second year in a row, they're bringing back invite-only deals. Here's what's available so far, plus everything else you need to know.

title: Hey, insomniacs: Get the award-winning Hatch smart alarm at a record-low price
content: In this early Prime Day deal, you can get the Hatch Restore 2 sunrise alarm clock for just $144.99 (reg. $199.99), its lowest-ever price.
summary: In this early Prime Day deal, you can get the Hatch Restore 2 sunrise alarm clock for just $144.99 (reg. $199.99), its lowest-ever price.

title: 'House of the Dragon' Season 2, episode 5: The moment Alicent *knows* what happened to Aegon

title: 'House of the Dragon' Season 2, episode 6 trailer faces a legendary dragon
